channel.title: Issues on aidswidjaja status page
channel.description: Recent content in Issues on aidswidjaja status page

item.title: bchan is slower
item.description: Investigating: bchan is currently on a bit on the slow side and you may experience more 502 Bad Gateway and 504 Gateway Timed Out issues than normal.

item.title: bchan is inaccessible
item.description: Resolved: thanks guys! We managed to get it back up and running by resetting the VM (haha turn your computer off and on again go brrrr) and that seems to have ironed out any problems it had before. We’re still seeing slightly more latency than usual (and you may get 502 Bad Gateway errors more often) but we’re hoping this evens out - we’re already seeing CPU usage gradually returning to normal.
